notes: Formal plated dinner with cocktail hour. Couple requests emphasis on locally sourced and seasonal ingredients where possible. Several guests with dietary restrictions noted below.

appetizers.name: Bacon-Wrapped Scallops
appetizers.description: Pan-seared diver scallops wrapped in applewood-smoked bacon, finished with a maple bourbon glaze

appetizers.name: Wagyu Beef Tartare
appetizers.description: Hand-cut A5 wagyu beef tartare with quail egg yolk, capers, shallots, and truffle aioli on toasted crostini

appetizers.name: Truffle Arancini
appetizers.description: Crispy risotto balls filled with black truffle and fontina cheese, served with San Marzano marinara dipping sauce

appetizers.name: Sesame Ahi Tuna Bites
appetizers.description: Sesame-crusted sashimi-grade ahi tuna on wonton crisps with wasabi cream, pickled ginger, and soy reduction

appetizers.name: Burrata & Prosciutto Crostini
appetizers.description: Creamy burrata cheese, aged prosciutto di Parma, fig jam, and micro arugula on grilled sourdough

appetizers.name: Lobster Bisque Shooters
appetizers.description: Smooth lobster bisque served in shot glasses, topped with creme fraiche, chive oil, and a pinch of smoked paprika

appetizers.name: Lamb Lollipops
appetizers.description: Grilled New Zealand lamb rib chops with rosemary-mint chimichurri and pomegranate molasses drizzle

appetizers.name: Wild Mushroom & Gruyere Tartlets
appetizers.description: Sauteed wild mushroom duxelles with aged Gruyere in golden puff pastry tartlet shells

appetizers.name: Hamachi Crudo
appetizers.description: Yellowtail hamachi with yuzu vinaigrette, thinly sliced jalapeno, fresh cilantro, and Maldon sea salt on crispy rice cakes

main_plates.name: Filet Mignon
main_plates.description: 8oz center-cut filet mignon with roasted garlic compound butter, truffle mashed potatoes, and grilled asparagus with hollandaise

main_plates.name: Pan-Seared Chilean Sea Bass
main_plates.description: Chilean sea bass fillet with saffron beurre blanc, roasted fingerling potatoes, and French haricots verts with shallot butter

main_plates.name: Herb-Crusted Rack of Lamb
main_plates.description: New Zealand rack of lamb with Dijon herb crust, rosemary red wine jus, potato dauphinoise, and roasted root vegetables

main_plates.name: Wagyu New York Strip
main_plates.description: 10oz Japanese A5 wagyu New York strip with bone marrow butter, roasted garlic confit, charred broccolini, and black truffle jus

main_plates.name: Roasted Duck Breast
main_plates.description: Pan-roasted Muscovy duck breast with cherry port wine reduction, wild rice pilaf, and sauteed Swiss chard with golden raisins

main_plates.name: Surf & Turf
main_plates.description: Butter-poached Maine lobster tail paired with 6oz filet mignon, bearnaise sauce, loaded twice-baked potato, and grilled asparagus

main_plates.name: Cedar-Planked Wild Salmon
main_plates.description: Wild Alaskan sockeye salmon on cedar plank with dill cream sauce, lemon-herb quinoa pilaf, and roasted seasonal vegetables

main_plates.name: Wild Mushroom & Truffle Risotto
main_plates.description: Arborio rice with sauteed wild mushrooms, shaved black truffle, aged Parmigiano-Reggiano, and white truffle oil finish

desserts.name: Classic Creme Brulee
desserts.description: Tahitian vanilla bean creme brulee with fresh seasonal berries and a butter shortbread cookie

desserts.name: Valrhona Chocolate Fondant
desserts.description: Warm Valrhona 70% dark chocolate fondant with raspberry coulis, edible gold leaf, and Madagascar vanilla bean ice cream

desserts.name: Classic Tiramisu
desserts.description: Traditional Italian tiramisu with espresso-soaked Savoiardi ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and Dutch cocoa dusting

desserts.name: Meyer Lemon Tart
desserts.description: Meyer lemon curd tart with toasted Italian meringue, candied lemon zest, and edible flowers on a butter shortcrust

desserts.name: Saffron Panna Cotta
desserts.description: Saffron-infused panna cotta with crushed pistachio crumble, rosewater syrup, and candied rose petals

desserts.name: Chocolate Truffle Trio
desserts.description: Handcrafted dark, milk, and white chocolate truffles finished with Fleur de Sel, espresso, and champagne flavors

desserts.name: Wedding Cake (Per Slice)
desserts.description: Three-tier vanilla genoise and champagne cake with Swiss buttercream frosting, fresh flowers, and gold leaf detail

cocktails.name: Lavender French 75
cocktails.description: Hendrick's gin, fresh lemon juice, house-made lavender simple syrup, topped with Veuve Clicquot champagne

cocktails.name: Smoked Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Woodford Reserve bourbon, Demerara sugar cube, Angostura and orange bitters, expressed orange peel, applewood smoke finish

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: Grey Goose vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, freshly pulled espresso shot, vanilla simple syrup, three coffee bean garnish

cocktails.name: Elderflower Spritz
cocktails.description: St-Germain elderflower liqueur, La Marca prosecco, soda water, fresh cucumber ribbon and mint sprig

cocktails.name: Spicy Mezcal Margarita
cocktails.description: Del Maguey Vida mezcal, Cointreau, fresh lime juice, agave nectar, muddled jalapeno, Tajin rim

cocktails.name: Japanese Whisky Highball
cocktails.description: Suntory Toki Japanese whisky, chilled sparkling water, expressed lemon peel, served in a tall frozen glass

cocktails.name: Rose Sangria
cocktails.description: Whispering Angel rose wine, Chambord black raspberry liqueur, white peach puree, fresh seasonal berries, and mint

cocktails.name: Garden Spritz (Non-Alcoholic)
cocktails.description: Seedlip Garden 108, Fever-Tree elderflower tonic, fresh cucumber, rosemary sprig, and a squeeze of grapefruit
